reviews.review: Great game especially with friends. Although the horror factor decreases as you play more, the strategic and tactical gaming decisions keep the game intense and fun. (From survivor standpoint).

Worst game ever!
I don't recommend it and I regret the time wasted on it !

Der Hype ist einfach abgeflacht und das Spiel ist eintönig geworden.

Die Survivor loopen nur noch und man ist nicht gewillt das rauszupatchen. Das macht es langweilig für den Survivor und nervig für den Killer.

O jogo te surpreende cada minuto que você joga. Deixei de jogar alguns jogos que estavam me estressando pra apostar nesse e vós digo, rapaziada... Valeu muito a pena. Nessa quarentena eu estou me divertindo pra carvalhos!
Adorei a proposta do jogo e pretendo jogar por muito tempo.


EDIT URGENTE 1

Tá, vamos lá.
Eu vim ler as análises do jogo e me deparei com diversas coisas injustas.
.
1° Uma galera que vive reclamando de toxidade sendo chata pra caralho. 
Sobreviventes: podem usar tudo de bom e do melhor pra atrapalhar a vida dos killers, mas se os killers usam noed (e as beldades não tiram os totens) ficam humilhando a pessoa no end game se achando os injustiçados.
Killers: se o cara faz gen rapido ou aperta Control fazendo t bag(o que e uma puta besteira alguém ficar tiltado com isso) os caras acham que os survival estão sendo tóxicos pra caralho por uma besteirinha.

Sinceramente a comunidade desse jogo só não e mais infantil que a do LoL.
.
Porra, um monte de adulto e adolescente frustrado com uma porcaria de joguinho.
.

Outros reclamando que o jogo e pago, mas tem que comprar os killers com licença de graça.
Meu, a empresa paga pra ter esses personagens nós jogos dela, se não compram, ela paga por algo que vai falir ela.
.
Aí esses caras vem aqui fazer textao falando que a empresa é mercenaria, que isso e aquilo se um puto de argumento viável, pq tem a cabeça feita por meia dúzia de streamers que fazem regrinhas que não existem PRA GALERA ACHAR QUE TEM QUE SER ASSIM E FICAR CHORANDO NO END GAME.
.
Meu, quer reclamar com a empresa, reclama do balanceamento, reclama da facilidade de subir de ranking, reclama dos bugs, não dessas frescurites, puta merda, parece que vocês foram criados a leite com pera.
.
O jogo e bom pra caralho, tem uma minoria da comunidade muito ruim que não entendem que o jogo é um jogo, levam tudo pro lado pessoal e ficam frustrados o tempo inteiro com tudo.
.
Falta arrumar bugs pra se tornar o que deveria ser e ter mais movimentação no passe de batalha pra quem quiser comprar (ter mais vezes), mais variedades de skins, pingentes...
.
E de último, uma dica pra quem ainda não entendeu o jogo: KILLER É PRA MATAR E SOBREVIVENTE É PRA FAZER GERADOR E FUGIR, ENTÃO FALA PRO TIO QUE NÃO VAI MAIS CHORAR POR BESTEIRA E JOGA O JOGO
.
 "Ah, mas o chat end game é muito tóxico" Muta o chat e jogue feliz, deixe de ser idiota.
PS: . E SE O CARA TE CAMPAR... ACABA O JOGO E VAI JOGAR OUTRO AS CHANCES DE CAIR COM CAMPER OUTRA VEZ SÃO MINIMAS. TCHAU.

Only complaint about this game is how much better the killers perks are compared to the survivors...example 

Killer Perk: If a survivor breathes while on the map their aura will be visible to you for 45 seconds this perk has a cooldown of .7 seconds.

Survivor Perk: If the killer runs in a straight line for 2mins while only looking left or right in 60 degree arcs a generator that has not been started yet will turn yellow for 1.3 seconds this perk has a 4min cooldown.

if you can live with playing a game heavily killer leaned (which honestly makes sense) then it can be fun, frustrating and addicting. I don't really enjoy playing the killer as like I said it feels incredibly easy and playing survivor is definitely more challenging.

Very fun game to play. In the early stages, the game is a bit confusing and can be frustrating at times. Watching videos and playing both roles can really help the player to understand the game better and makes the game more fun as a whole. One thing I really enjoy about the game is being able to play both roles meaning that you can even consider it having a singleplayer/multiplayer mode, and what I mean by that is I can play survivor when I have friends on and if not play killer and have just as much fun as I would survivor. Great game overall.

pretty good job so far

Where do I start?

Laggy servers, unbalanced gameplay, bugs out the wazoo, and oh boy what a toxic community. Ranks are an absolute joke, so have fun with "high ranks" that will quite literally leave you to die. The only thing for sure is that BHVR is banking on cosmetics and DLC to keep this mess alive. You can only have so much fun with teammates that often won't lift a finger to help, and then will be plain toxic in end game chat. Many of the actually useful perks are locked behind paywalls, either requiring real money to get to, or in-game awarded currency that takes obnoxiously long to get enough to buy what you need. Server desync is so bad at times, you'll have vaulted a pallet or window, or ran around a corner out of the killer's reach, only for a hit to register anyways. The only way you're ever going to have fun is if you play with a friend or more, or just play to troll.

Oh, did I mention the player base is so dead you'll often run into the same teammates and killer multiple times in an hour or two, and day after day?

This title is on death's door, and oh boy is he knocking.

为了月光光心慌慌、电锯惊魂而来，特别喜欢迈叔和杨姐，还准备买鬼面，买了玩一下去追惊声尖叫，嘿嘿，很喜欢游戏血腥恐怖范围，本身就特别喜欢血腥恐怖，平时也喜欢看类型电影，追完月光光心慌慌就彻底爱上了杀人魔电影，游戏很棒，完美还原月光光心慌慌追逐击杀的快感，唯一遗憾就是游戏活动不足，互动过少，还有就是没有森哥！！！

Игра находится в бета версии , игра недоработана , щас объясню . Игра в своём жанре потрясающая , но разрабы кон**нные пи*о*асы , как будто бета версия , хитбоксы на пол экрана , навыки выживших , которые стали не играбельными , например : осколок , но игроки и я играют против тунелинга , но если маньяк гений , будет считать минуту . Навыки маньяков , которые ебут тебя , например : разлад , бАРБЕКЬЮ И ЧИЛИ , наеды , пожирание надежды и т.д , т.п . Разные уе*аны , которые тунелят и кемпят . 9 из 10 игр сурвы просто сосут члены , любой маньяк с любыми навыками и любой силы мана , ты все ровно сосешь 9 из 10 игр . За 4 года нету голосового чата , есть только иди ко мне и иди туда . Лучше играть с друзьями в дискорде , а лучше свою игру . Если разрабы возьмутся за игру ,я думаю будет как дота , но почему ДАЖЕ дота ЛУчшЕ , чем эта ху*та . Разрабы больше читают инглиш обзоры , но все ровно не пытаются что-то делать . По моему опыту я играю на топ 1 ранг сурва , я делаю такие мувы что на топ 1 , обычно не делают , но спасибо за хитбоксы , а за мана изи взять топ 1 , но щас топ 8 , даже в падлу за манов играть и я юзаю 1 навык пидорский это разлад , но разлад более менее норм чем наед и барбекью , объясню в том что навык по идеи норм , но слишком много подсвечивает желтым цветом , за то контрит ген раши , но иногда нет . Я думаю , если разрабы пофиксят всё и переделают все навыки в игре и персонажей и силы манов , то игра будет хорошой .

Gra ma tylko dwa tryby rozgrywki (tj. survivor albo killer), co nie stanowi dużej rozmaitości jak chodzi o gameplay, ale rekompensuje to ilością postaci, z których każda ma swoje unikalne perki. Każdy indywidualny perk w pewnym momencie rozgrywki można odblokować do każdej postaci, co liczbę buildów ograniczoną tylko przez ogólną liczbę perków. Sam gameplay nie jest jakoś bardzo rozbudowany, ale dzięki temu rozgrywka przeważnie trwa około 10 minut. Balans gry jest jak w każdej grze multiplayer niezbyt zachowany, lecz postacie uznawane za overpowered można policzyć na palcach jednej ręki, a nadal da się je skontrować. 
Grę oceniam na 7/10. Nadal przydałby się jakiś dodatkowy tryb gry, niektóre mapy są według mnie gorzej zaprojektowane, ale nadal czerpię jakoś z tej gry przyjemność.

Dead By Daylight is one of the best games I've ever played. No it's not perfect, no I can't say I never rage, and no, I can't say that it's always balanced. However, every single time I play this game, it is enjoyable due to it's unforgiving and challenging mechanics as a survivor and or killer. I believe I'm versed enough in the game to reliably review it considering I'm survivor rank 2 atm. If you're looking for a game to have fun with your friends, there's a custom game option, and even SWF (Surviving with friends) is a great time in multiplayer. Try this game, build the community. Thanks,
P.S. Don't be toxic everyone :D

You can enjoy this game only with friends and only playing for fun.

Community is "awesome". 
Yes you can find good friends. 
But mostly when you play good and trying to be nice you will receive a lot of messages about how worst you are. 
Or that you will be banned because you are a cheater. (Never play and don't recommend to play with cheats. It's unfair and don't provide any "joyness".)

Maybe I will play this game some time more. Until I will decide that it's time to delete this game and forget about it's existence. Or maybe I will change my mind in a future and than will edit this review.

tl;dr: The game can be bullshit when first starting out, and sometimes even when you've played for hundreds or thousands of hours. But despite all of its flaws it's still a fun game to invest time into and learn, so long as you don't mind the shitty community. 

My unprofessional thoughts on the game?

It's worth getting to learn it, in my opinion. Personally I quite enjoy this game very much so, despite the lackluster community and shitty play styles. Granted, said play styles are fair game, but still...

The game is definitely hard getting into when you're just starting out, you'll feel hopeless, like survivor is so weak and underpowered and can't do anything. 

As a first time survivor you won't know how to loop, you won't know how to 360, you won't know how and when it's safe to vault. Or how to blind killers, or when to drop or save pallets. You'll most likely experience insta-down killers such as Michael Myers, Ghostface, or anyone running Devour Hope. Or killers that go stealth and give you no indication that they're coming or even near you. You'll probably end up going against someone running No One Escapes Death, or get trolled by Blood Warden. You WILL die a lot.   As a result you will most likely think the game is shitty and survivors are underpowered and killers are overpowered.

For first time killer you wont know how to end chases quickly, how to break loops, when to break pallets, when to hit generators. Or when to slug survivors. When to use your power, or even how to use your power. How to use your power effectively. Little nuances like how to moonwalk and hide your red stain and mind game survivors. You'll probably eat a lot of pallets, Decisive Strikes, Head Ons, and a few other perks.  As a result you will most likely think killer is underpowered and survivors are overpowered. Either way, playing survivor or killer, you'll think the game is trash.

Again the game is hard to get into, let alone learn, and on top of all of that the game has its bugs. Top all of this off with a less than stellar community that like to BM(Bad Manner, basically being rude) you in-game and then talk shit during end game chat. This leaves you with a recipe for why people think this game is trash and refuse to play the game or even give it a second chance. Despite all this, in truthful and humble opinion, the game It is by no means perfect, but still worth the time investment. 

I promise you if you stick it out, can ignore the shitty people and learn the mechanics of the game you'll have a good time.
